level.heading: Information reporting.
level.text: Within 3 days after the Mayor's receipt of the transcript of proceedings relating to the issuance of the bonds, the Mayor shall transmit a copy of the transcript to the Secretary to the Council.

level.heading: Emergency Legislation
level.text: For temporary (90 day) addition, see ยง 113 of New Convention Center Hotel Omnibus Financing and Development Emergency Act of 2006 (D.C. Act 16-404, June 26, 2006, 53 DCR 5404).

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 16-163
level.text: For Law 16-163, see notes following ยง 10-1221.01
